key_risks: Environmental impact due to rising energy consumption in data centers
Regulatory and compliance challenges across multiple jurisdictions
Intense market competition from data center providers and hyperscalers
Supply chain disruptions affecting infrastructure expansion and maintenance
Employee relations concerns due to layoffs amid AI investment plans
controversies: Employee layoffs during a $15 billion AI investment initiative
Potential long-term environmental sustainability challenges despite renewable energy goals
environmental_issues: Data centers' energy-intensive operations and projected tripling of power consumption in Europe by 2030
social_issues: Workforce management and morale concerns due to layoffs
governance_issues: Navigating complex global data privacy and security regulations
